title: Matt Gaetz
deleted: On August 31, federal authorities arrested Florida developer Stephen Alford on charges of wire fraud and destruction of property subject to a seizure warrant over allegations that he tried to extort $25 million from Gaetz's father in exchange for a presidential pardon for Gaetz. The money was allegedly planned to be used to fund a scheme to rescue (the presumed dead) federal agent Robert Levinson.
